definition: to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
Globalnaya Navigatsionaya Satelinaya Sistema or Global Navigation Satellite System (GLONASS), the Russian equivalent of GPS/abbr. to 格洛納斯|格洛纳斯
pinyin: quan2 qiu2 wei4 xing1 dao3 hang2 xi4 tong3

definition: BeiDou Navigation Satellite System (BDS) (similar to GPS)
pinyin: Bei3 Dou3 Wei4 xing1 Dao3 hang2 Xi4 tong3
wei4 xing1 dao3 hang2 xi4 tong3

sentences.english: Mr. Kallasvuo said maps and navigation will be at the heart of the company's connection services.
sentences.chinese: 康培凱說，地圖和導航將是公司連接服務的核心。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is necessary to improve the current navigation means of the subsonic vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 因此，有必要對亞音速飛行器的導航方案進行改進。

sentences.english: We can go there without navigation.
sentences.chinese: 俺們不用導航也能到那可以。

sentences.english: In this case, auto-pilot mode is sure to crash the plane.
sentences.chinese: 在這方面，自動導航模式肯定會讓飛機墜毀。

sentences.english: They could soon take it to the next level by excising the traditional navigation toolbar.
sentences.chinese: 下一步他們很快就會把手伸向現存的傳統導航工具欄。

sentences.english: The aircraft engines, autopilot, and navigation system are absolutely reliable .
sentences.chinese: 飛機發動機，自動駕駛儀和導航系統絕對可靠。

sentences.english: The principle of equivalence is of critical importance in our analysis of inertial navigation .
sentences.chinese: 等效原理在慣性導航分析中特別重要。

sentences.english: “Soft” hover effects often support the navigation design by making browsing more pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 導航設計中的鼠標懸停效果會讓瀏覽變得更愉快。

sentences.english: All the navigation, climate and entertainment options are also voice-activated.
sentences.chinese: 所有的導航，天氣狀況以及娛樂選擇功能都是聲控的。

sentences.english: The Viewer navigation bar is used when displaying a multi-page report.
sentences.chinese: 當顯示一個多頁的報表時我們將使用查看器導航條。

sentences.english: Honestly, the rate of commi ion you are going to grant us is far too small.
sentences.chinese: 說實話，你方給我們的導航已取消怎麼辦佣金太少了。

sentences.english: Breadcrumbs are an indication of the customer’s location within your site.
sentences.chinese: 當前位置導航欄是用以指示客戶在網站中的位置。

sentences.english: They travel in a car that navigates and drives itself.
sentences.chinese: 他們通過一輛能自我導航和駕駛的汽車旅行。

sentences.english: The makers of navigation devices have not ignored the spread of smartphones.
sentences.chinese: 導航設備製造商們並沒有忽略向智能手機的延伸。

sentences.english: This paper proposes an ontology-driven intelligent knowledge navigation map.
sentences.chinese: 該文提出建立基於本體驅動的智能知識導航圖。

sentences.english: Navigate to the product license library or folder where you have your activation keys.
sentences.chinese: 導航到存儲激活密鑰的產品許可證庫或文件夾。

definition: to lead the way/to guide/to show the way/fig. to instruct
to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
network (computer, telecom)/Internet/Taiwanese term for 網絡|网络[wang3 luo4]
to get off or out of (a bus, train, car etc)
